searchSql.baseSql: select sab.case_code,pi.property_addr,tab.guohu_time,sab.sum_base_amount,tab.paid_time from (select case_code,sum(base_amount) sum_base_amount from sctrans.t_ts_award_base where PARTICIPANT = #userId# group by case_code) sab inner join ( select * from ( select *, ROW_NUMBER() over(partition by case_code order by guohu_time desc) num from sctrans.t_ts_award_base where PARTICIPANT = #userId# ) t where t.num = 1 ) tab on sab.case_code = tab.case_code left join sctrans.t_to_property_info pi on tab.case_code = pi.case_code where 1 = 1 <if test="caseCode != null and caseCode != '' "> and sab.case_code = #caseCode# </if> <if test="propertyAddr != null and propertyAddr != '' "> and pi.property_addr like '%' + #propertyAddr# + '%' </if> <if test="paidTime != null and paidTime != '' " > and DATEDIFF(mm,tab.paid_time,#paidTime#) = 0 </if> <if test="dtBegin != null and dtBegin != '' " > and tab.guohu_time >= #dtBegin# </if> <if test="dtEnd != null and dtEnd != '' " > and tab.guohu_time <= #dtEnd# </if> order by guohu_time desc
select SRV_CODE, BASE_AMOUNT, SRV_PART_IN, SRV_PART_TOTAL from sctrans.t_ts_award_base where case_Code = #caseCode# and PARTICIPANT = #userId#
select SRV_CODE, BASE_AMOUNT, SRV_PART_IN, SRV_PART_TOTAL from sctrans.t_ts_award_base where case_Code = #caseCode# and PARTICIPANT = #userId#

select sum(srv_part_in) SRV_PART_IN_COUNT, sum(srv_part_in/srv_part_total) SRV_PART_RATIO_COUNT, count(distinct case_code) CASE_CODE_COUNT from sctrans.t_ts_award_base where PARTICIPANT = #userId# and srv_part_total > 0
select sum(srv_part_in) SRV_PART_IN_COUNT, count(distinct case_code) CASE_CODE_COUNT from sctrans.t_ts_award_base where PARTICIPANT = #userId# and srv_part_total > 0
